entries.title: The Far Side comic 1 for August 13, 2024

summary.caption: “Here’s the last entry in Carlson’s journal: ‘Having won their confidence, tomorrow I shall test the humor of these giant but gentle primates with a simple joy-buzzer handshake.’”

entries.title: The Far Side comic 2 for August 13, 2024
The Far Side comic 3 for August 13, 2024

summary.caption: “The problem, Mr. Fudd, is that you’ve been having a subliminal effect on everyone in the factory. We’re proud of our product, Mr. Fudd, and there’s no company in the world that builds a finer skwoo dwivuh. … Dang! Now you got me doing it!”

summary.caption: Dirk brings his family tree to class.
